text: Myrcianthes is a genus of flowering plants in the myrtle family, Myrtaceae described as a genus in 1856.Berg, Otto Karl. 1856. Linnaea 27(3): 315 in LatinTropicos, Myrcianthes O. Berg They are native to Central and South America, the West Indies, and southern Florida.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ==Taxonomy== Accepted species: {| class="wikitable" |- !
